A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wld have been served much better by another edit and maybe some reshoots.   There are a lot of good parts to this movie\, particularly the Luke/Rey storyline and the Rey/Kylo Ren storyline.  However\, everything else about the movie is very strained and just bogs it down.  Some story tightening and maybe a rewrite of these sections of the film to present the point these parts are trying to make in a much more cohesive way would have really helped to make this a much better film.  Overall\, it is an OK movie\, but ha some REAL problems.
